sourcesContent:
<template>
    <wavesurfer :src="file" :options="options"></wavesurfer>
</template>

<script>
import WaveSurfer from 'wavesurfer.js'

export default {

  name: “Details”,

  data() {

    return {

      wavesurfer: null,

    };

  },

  mounted() {

    this.$nextTick(() => {

      this.wavesurfer = WaveSurfer.create({

        container: this.$refs.waveform,

        // waveColor: ‘#409EFF’,

        barWidth: 1,

        cursorColor: “black”,

        progressColor: “blue”,

        backend: “MediaElement”,

        // mediaControls: false,

        audioRate: “1”,

//Using the timeline plug-in

      });

//Special reminder: you need to use require (relative path) here, otherwise an error will be reported
      this.wavesurfer.load(require(“../mp3/living.mp3”));
    });
  },

  methods: {
    playMusic() {

//Click the “play / pause” button to trigger an event. If you pause, click to play. If you are playing, click to pause
      this.wavesurfer.playPause.bind(this.wavesurfer)();
    },
  },
};

</script>


<style scoped>


</style>
